channel.title: SoftLayer_Tags on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Tags on SoftLayer API

item.title: Working with Tags
item.description:
Tags Get all tags import SoftLayer client = SoftLayer.create_client_from_env() try: response = client.iter_call('SoftLayer_Account', 'getTags', limit=50) for tag in response: print(tag) except SoftLayer.SoftLayerAPIError as e: print("Unable to list the response for the package: 
faultCode= %s, 
 
faultString= %s" % (e.faultCode, e.faultString)) Simple Tag Search. import SoftLayer import json client = SoftLayer.create_client_from_env() tag_service = client['Tag'] # Tag inputted by the user param = 'test example' try: response = tag_service.autocomplete(param) print(json.dumps(response, sort_keys=True, indent=2, separators=(',', ': '))) except SoftLayer.
